title: Cate Blanchett: Screen Worlds Spotlight interview

video_links.name: Cate Blanchett: Screen Worlds Spotlight interview

brief_description: An interview with actor Cate Blanchett for Screen Worlds at ACMI. Cate Blanchett is an actor who has multiple awards including Golden Globe and Academy awards, and is well known for her roles in films such as “Elizabeth”, “Carol” and “I’m Not There”.
